title: 92/246/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 April 1992 amending Commission Decision 91/449/EEC laying down the specimen animal health certificates in respect of meat products imported from third countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 14 April 1992  amending Commission Decision 91/449/EEC laying down the specimen animal health certificates in respect of meat products imported from third countries  (92/246/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Annex C, part II of Decision 91/449/EEC, the list of countries approved to use the model animal health certificate is amended by the addition of the following country: 'South Africa'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 April 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28. (2) OJ No L 356, 24. 12. 1991, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 146, 14. 6. 1979, p. 15. (4) OJ No L 71, 18. 3. 1992, p. 30. (5) OJ No L 240, 29. 8. 1991, p. 28. (6) See page 42 of this Official Journal.
